## Gears per transmission

Transmission type and number of gears are encoded in the same variable, a simple bar plot helps:

```{r echo=TRUE}
ggplot(data = mpg) +
  geom_bar(mapping = aes(x = trans))
```


## Gears per transmission

Bar charts support the "fill" aesthetic:

```{r echo=TRUE}
ggplot(data = mpg) +
  geom_bar(mapping = aes(x = trans))
```
